translations: n.作家；[图情]作者（writer 的复数）

phrs.translation: n. 编剧；电影剧本作者

sentences.sentence: Few writers approach his richness of language.
sentences.translation: 他语言之丰富很少有作家能望其项背。

sentences.sentence: These cases all attracted flocks of famous writers.
sentences.translation: 这些案例均吸引了大批知名作家。

sentences.sentence: Many writers at this time held rigidly dogmatic views.
sentences.translation: 许多作家这一时期刻板地固守教条主义的观点。
